NAME: scan_line_number
LONG_NAME: scan line number

NAME: scan_line_time
LONG_NAME: time for the scan line in fractional hours

NAME: bad_pixel_mask
LONG_NAME: mask that distinguishes good(0) from bad(1) pixels

NAME: gap_pixel_mask
LONG_NAME: mask that distinguishes not in gap (0) from in-gap(1) pixels

NAME: diagnostic_1
LONG_NAME: First diagnostic variable (contents will change)

NAME: diagnostic_2
LONG_NAME: Second diagnostic variable (contents will change)

NAME: diagnostic_3
LONG_NAME: third diagnostic variable (contents will change)

NAME: packed_pixel_meta_data
LONG_NAME: order_and_depth: bad_pixel_mask(1),solar_contamination_mask(1),ch6_on_pixel_mask(1),Bayes_Mask_Sfc_Type(3)

NAME: latitude
LONG_NAME: latitude

NAME: longitude
LONG_NAME: longitude

NAME: latitude_pc
LONG_NAME: latitude_parallax_corrected_using_cloud_height

NAME: longitude_pc
LONG_NAME: longitude_parallax_corrected_using_cloud_height

NAME: sensor_zenith_angle
LONG_NAME: sensor zenith for each pixel measured in degrees from nadir

NAME: solar_zenith_angle
LONG_NAME: solar zenith for each pixel measured in degrees away from the sun (0=looking at sun)

NAME: relative_azimuth_angle
LONG_NAME: relative azimuth angle in degrees. 0 is the principal plane looking towards sun

NAME: solar_azimuth_angle
LONG_NAME: solar azimuth angle in degrees from north, pixel to sun, positive values are clockwise from north

NAME: sensor_azimuth_angle
LONG_NAME: sensor azimuth angle in degrees from north, pixel to sensor, positive values are clockwise from north

NAME: glint_zenith_angle
LONG_NAME: glint zenith for each pixel measured in degrees away from the specular image of sun

NAME: scattering_angle
LONG_NAME: scattering angle for each pixel measured in degrees away from direction of forward scattering

NAME: lunar_zenith_angle
LONG_NAME: lunar zenith for each pixel measured in degrees away from the moon (0=looking at sun)

NAME: lunar_relative_azimuth_angle
LONG_NAME: relative azimuth angle in degrees. 0 is the principal plane looking towards moon

NAME: lunar_azimuth_angle
LONG_NAME: lunar azimuth angle in degrees from north

NAME: packed_land_cover
LONG_NAME: land cover, snow and coast values packed into one byte, see patmos-x docs to unpack

NAME: glint_mask
LONG_NAME: glint mask (0=no) (1=yes)

NAME: coast_mask
LONG_NAME: coast mask (0=no) (1=yes)

NAME: surface_type
LONG_NAME: UMD surface type: water=0,evergreen_needle=1,evergreen_broad=2,deciduous_needle=3,deciduous_broad=4,mixed_forest=5,woodlands=6,wooded_grass=7closed_shrubs=8,open_shrubs=9,grasses=10,croplands=11,bare=12,urban=13

NAME: land_class
LONG_NAME: land classes and values:shallow ocean=0,land=1,coastline=2,shallow inland water=3,ephemeral water=4,deep inland water=5,moderate ocean=6,deep ocean=7

NAME: snow_class
LONG_NAME: snow classes and values:no snow/ice=1,sea_ice=2,snow=3

NAME: surface_elevation
LONG_NAME: surface elevation above mean sea level

NAME: refl_0_65um_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 0.65 microns - NOAA CDR

NAME: refl_0_86um_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 0.86 microns - NOAA CDR

NAME: refl_0_47um_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 0.47 microns

NAME: refl_1_60um_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 1.60 microns - NOAA CDR

NAME: refl_sol_dnb_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance solar dnb channel

NAME: refl_lunar_dnb_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance lunar dnb channel

NAME: refl_3_75um_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 3.75 microns - NOAA CDR

NAME: temp_3_75um_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere brightness temperature at the nominal wavelength of 3.75 microns - NOAA CDR

NAME: temp_8_5um_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere brightness temperature at the nominal wavelength of 8.5 microns

NAME: temp_11_0um_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere brightness temperature at the nominal wavelength of 11.0 microns - NOAA CDR

NAME: temp_12_0um_nom
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere brightness temperature at the nominal wavelength of 12.0 microns - NOAA CDR

NAME: refl_0_65um_nom_stddev_3x3
LONG_NAME: standard deviation of the 0.63 micron reflectance computed over a 3x3 pixel array

NAME: temp_11_0um_nom_stddev_3x3
LONG_NAME: standard deviation of the 11 micron brightness temperature computed over a 3x3 pixel array

NAME: cloud_probability
LONG_NAME: probability of a pixel being cloudy from the Bayesian cloud mask

NAME: cloud_mask
LONG_NAME: integer classification of the cloud mask including clear=0, probably-clear=1, probably-cloudy=2, cloudy=3

NAME: adj_pix_cloud_mask
LONG_NAME: integer classification of the adjacent pixel cloud mask including clear=0, probably-clear=1, probably-cloudy=2, cloudy=3

NAME: cloud_mask_test_packed_results
LONG_NAME: individual cloud mask packed test results

NAME: cloud_mask_1b
LONG_NAME: integer classification of the cloud mask including clear=0, probably-clear=1, probably-cloudy=2, cloudy=3 from mask read from level-1b file

NAME: bayes_mask_sfc_type
LONG_NAME: integer classification of the surface type assumed in constructed the Bayesian cloud mask, 1=deep water,2=shallow ocean,3=land,4=snow,5=arctic,6=antarctic+greenland,7=desert

NAME: cloud_type
LONG_NAME: integer classification of the cloud type including clear and aerosol type,0=clear,1=probably clear,2=fog,3=water,4=supercooled water,5=mixed,6=opaque_ice,7=cirrus,8=overlapping,9=overshooting,10=unknown,11=dust,12=smoke

NAME: cloud_phase
LONG_NAME: integer classification of the cloud phase including clear and aerosol type,0=clear,1=water,2=supercooled water,3=mixed,4=ice,5=unknown

NAME: cloud_type_1b
LONG_NAME: integer classification of the cloud type including clear and aerosol type read from level-1b file

NAME: cld_press_acha
LONG_NAME: cloud-top pressure computed using the AWG cloud height algorithm

NAME: cld_temp_acha
LONG_NAME: cloud-top temperature computed using the AWG cloud height algorithm - NOAA CDR

NAME: cld_height_acha
LONG_NAME: cloud height computed using the AWG cloud height algorithm

NAME: cld_height_top_acha
LONG_NAME: estimate of actual cloud-top height computed using the AWG cloud height algorithm

NAME: cld_height_base_acha
LONG_NAME: estimate of actual cloud-base height computed using the AWG cloud height algorithm

NAME: cld_altitude_acha
LONG_NAME: cloud height altitude computed from pressure values

NAME: acha_processing_order
LONG_NAME: integer classification of the order of processing with ACHA

NAME: acha_inversion_flag
LONG_NAME: flag stating whether ACHA was processed assuming an inversion(1) or not(0)

NAME: cld_height_h2o
LONG_NAME: cloud-top height computed using the two-point h2o intercept

NAME: cld_height_opaque
LONG_NAME: cloud-top height computed using assuming the cloud is opaque

NAME: cld_emiss_acha
LONG_NAME: cloud emissivity at the nominal wavelength of 11 microns, determined from the AWG cloud height algorithm - NOAA CDR

NAME: cld_beta_acha
LONG_NAME: cloud 11/12 micron beta value determined from the split-window method

NAME: cld_height_uncer_acha
LONG_NAME: cloud height uncertainty computed using the AWG cloud height algorithm

NAME: cld_temp_uncer_acha
LONG_NAME: cloud temperature uncertainty computed using the AWG cloud height algorithm

NAME: cld_temp_acha_qf
LONG_NAME: quality flag for cloud-top temperature from ACHA not attempted=0

NAME: cld_emiss_acha_qf
LONG_NAME: quality flag for 11.0 micron cloud emissivity from ACHA not attempted=0, failed=1, low quality=2, high quality=3

NAME: cld_beta_acha_qf
LONG_NAME: quality flag for cloud 11.0/12.0 micron beta from ACHA not attempted=0, failed=1, low quality=2, high quality=3

NAME: cld_opd_acha
LONG_NAME: cloud optical depth at the nominal wavelength of 0.65 microns, determined from ACHA

NAME: cld_reff_acha
LONG_NAME: effective radius of cloud particles determined from ACHA; see attributes for channels used

NAME: acha_quality
LONG_NAME: quality flags for ACHA products 1:Processed (0=no,1=yes) 2:valid Tc retrieval (1=yes,0=no) 3:valid ec retrieval (1=yes,0=no) 4:valid beta retrieval (1=yes,0=no) 5:degraded Tc retrieval (1=yes,0=no) 6:degraded ec retrieval (1=yes,0=no) 7:degraded beta retrieval (1=yes,0=no)

NAME: acha_info
LONG_NAME: processing information for ACHA (0=no/1=yes) 1:Cloud Height Attempted 2:Bias Correction Employed 3:Ice Cloud Retrieval 4:Local Radiative Center Processing Used 5:Multi-layer Retrieval 6:Lower Cloud Interpolation Used 7:Boundary Layer Inversion Assumed

NAME: cld_opd_dcomp
LONG_NAME: cloud optical depth at the nominal wavelength of 0.65 microns, determined from DCOMP - NOAA CDR

NAME: cld_reff_dcomp
LONG_NAME: effective radius of cloud particles determined from DCOMP; see attributes for channels used - NOAA CDR

NAME: cld_opd_dcomp_unc
LONG_NAME: uncertainty in the log10 cloud optical depth at the nominal wavelength of 0.65 microns, determined from DCOMP; see attributes for channels used

NAME: cld_reff_dcomp_unc
LONG_NAME: uncertainty in the log10 effective radius of cloud particle determined from DCOMP; see attributes for channels used

NAME: cld_opd_dcomp_qf
LONG_NAME: quality flag for cloud optical depth from DCOMP not attempted=0, failed=1, low quality=2, high quality=3

NAME: cld_reff_dcomp_qf
LONG_NAME: quality flag for cloud effective radius from DCOMP not attempted=0, failed=1, low quality=2, high quality=3

NAME: dcomp_quality
LONG_NAME: quality flags for DCOMP products 1:Processed (0=no,1=yes) 2:valid COD retrieval (0=yes,1=no) 3:valid REF retrieval (0=yes,1=no) 4:degraded COD retrieval (0=no,1=degraded) 5:degraded REF retrieval (0=no,1=degraded) 6:convergency (0=no,1=yes) 7:glint (0=no,1=yes)

NAME: dcomp_info
LONG_NAME: processing flags for DCOMP 1:info flag set ? (0=no,1=yes) 2:land/sea mask (0=land,1=sea) 3:day/night mask (0=Day,1=Night) 4:twilight (65-82 solar zenith) (0=no,1=yes) 5:snow (0=no,1= snow) 6:sea-ice (0=no,1=sea-ice) 7:phase (0=liquid,1=ice) 8:thick_cloud (0=no,1=yes) 9:thin_cloud (0=no,1=yes)

NAME: insolation_dcomp
LONG_NAME: surface downwelling shortwave flux computed from the DCOMP cloud properties

NAME: insolation_diffuse_dcomp
LONG_NAME: diffuse component of the surface downwelling shortwave flux computed from the DCOMP cloud properties

NAME: cld_opd_nlcomp
LONG_NAME: cloud optical depth at the nominal wavelength of 0.65 microns, determined from NLCOMP

NAME: cld_reff_nlcomp
LONG_NAME: effective radius of cloud particles determined from NLCOMP; see attributes for channels used

NAME: cld_opd_nlcomp_unc
LONG_NAME: uncertainty in cloud optical depth at the nominal wavelength of 0.65 microns, determined from NLCOMP

NAME: cld_reff_nlcomp_unc
LONG_NAME: effective radius of cloud particle determined from NLCOMP; see attributes for channels used

NAME: nlcomp_quality
LONG_NAME: quality flags for NLCOMP products  see documentation http://cimss.ssec.wisc.edu/clavr/ 1:Processed (0=no,1=yes) 2:valid COD retrieval (0=yes,1=no) 3:valid REF retrieval (0=yes,1=no) 4:degraded COD retrieval (0=no,1=degraded) 5:degraded REF retrieval (0=no,1=degraded) 6:convergency (0=no,1=yes) 7:glint (0=no,1=yes)

NAME: nlcomp_info
LONG_NAME: processing flags for NLCOMP see http://cimss.ssec.wisc.edu/clavr/ 1: info flag set ? (0=no,1=yes) 2: land/sea mask (0=land,1=sea) 3: day/night mask (0=Day,1=Night) 4: twilight (65-82 solar zenith) (0=no,1=yes) 5: snow (0=no,1= snow) 6: sea-ice (0=no,1=sea-ice) 7: phase (0=liquid,1=ice) 8: thick_cloud (0=no,1=yes) 9: thin_cloud (0=no,1=yes)

NAME: cloud_albedo_0_65um_nom
LONG_NAME: cloud albedo at 0.65 microns nominal from DCOMP

NAME: cloud_transmission_0_65um_nom
LONG_NAME: cloud transmission 0.65 microns nominal from DCOMP

NAME: cloud_fraction
LONG_NAME: cloud fraction computed over a 3x3 pixel array at the native resolution centered on this pixel

NAME: cloud_fraction_uncertainty
LONG_NAME: cloud fraction uncertainty computed over a 3x3 array

NAME: emissivity_11um_tropopause
LONG_NAME: emissivity at the nominal wavelength of 11 microns, assuming the cloud was located at the Tropopause

NAME: ndvi_sfc
LONG_NAME: normalized difference vegetation index, atmospherically corrected

NAME: ndvi_sfc_white_sky
LONG_NAME: normalized difference vegetation index, atmospherically corrected, modis white sky

NAME: surface_temperature_retrieved
LONG_NAME: surface temperature retrieved using atmospherically corrected 11 micron radiance

NAME: surface_air_temperature_nwp
LONG_NAME: surface air temperature from NWP ancillary data

NAME: surface_radiation_temperature_retrieved
LONG_NAME: surface radiation temperature retrieved using atmospherically corrected 11 micron radiance assuming a black surface

NAME: surface_temperature_background
LONG_NAME: surface temperature assumed using ancillary data sources

NAME: surface_relative_humidity_nwp
LONG_NAME: near-surface relative humidity from NWP ancillary data

NAME: surface_pressure_background
LONG_NAME: surface pressure assumed using ancillary data sources

NAME: mean_sealevel_pressure_background
LONG_NAME: mean sealevel pressure assumed using ancillary data sources

NAME: k_index_nwp
LONG_NAME: k index computed from NWP ancillary data sources

NAME: cloud_water_path_nwp
LONG_NAME: cloud water path computed from NWP ancillary data sources

NAME: cloud_fraction_nwp
LONG_NAME: cloud fraction computed from NWP ancillary data sources

NAME: cld_press_nwp
LONG_NAME: cloud-top pressure computed from NWP ancillary data sources

NAME: number_cloud_layers_nwp
LONG_NAME: number cloud layers in column from NWP ancillary data sources

NAME: cloud_type_nwp
LONG_NAME: cloud type from NWP ancillary data sources, see PATMOS-x documentation for key

NAME: tropopause_temperature_nwp
LONG_NAME: tropopause temperature from NWP ancillary data

NAME: lcl_nwp
LONG_NAME: lifting condensation level from NWP ancillary data

NAME: ccl_nwp
LONG_NAME: convective condensation level from NWP ancillary data

NAME: remote_sensing_reflectance
LONG_NAME: remote sensing reflectance (upward radiance/downward irradiance at surface)

NAME: quality_flags_1
LONG_NAME: first set of packed quality flags, deprecated. Use *_qf variables.

NAME: quality_flags_2
LONG_NAME: second set of packed quality flags, deprecated. Use *_qf variables.

NAME: refl_0_65um_nom_counts
LONG_NAME: instrument counts for the nominal 0.65 micron channel

NAME: refl_0_86um_nom_counts
LONG_NAME: instrument counts for the nominal 0.86 micron channel

NAME: refl_1_60um_nom_counts
LONG_NAME: instrument counts for the nominal 1.6 micron channel

NAME: total_precipitable_water_nwp
LONG_NAME: total precipitable water from NWP ancillary data

NAME: refl_3_75um_nom_atmos_corr
LONG_NAME: observed pseudo-reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 3.75 microns, atmospherically corrected, expressed as a percentage using PATMOS-x calibration

NAME: refl_0_65um_nom_atmos_corr
LONG_NAME: observed pseudo-reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 0.65 microns, atmospherically corrected, expressed as a percentage using PATMOS-x calibration

NAME: refl_0_86um_nom_atmos_corr
LONG_NAME: observed pseudo-reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 0.85 microns, atmospherically corrected, expressed as a percentage using PATMOS-x calibration

NAME: refl_1_60um_nom_atmos_corr
LONG_NAME: observed pseudo-reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 1.60 microns, atmospherically corrected, expressed as a percentage using PATMOS-x calibration

NAME: pixel_sst_masked
LONG_NAME: sea surface skin temperature at the pixel with land mask and cloud mask applied

NAME: refl_0_65um_nom_unnormalized
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 0.65 microns unnormalized to the cosine of the solar zenith angle

NAME: refl_0_86um_nom_unnormalized
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 0.86 microns unnormalized to the cosine of the solar zenith angle

NAME: refl_1_60um_nom_unnormalized
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 1.60 microns unnormalized to the cosine of the solar zenith angle

NAME: refl_0_65um_nom_clear_sky
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere bidirectional reflectance modeled assuming clear skies at the nominal wavelength of 0.65 microns

NAME: temp_3_75um_nom_clear_sky
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere brightness temperature modeled assuming clear skies at the nominal wavelength of 11.0 microns

NAME: temp_8_5um_nom_clear_sky
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere brightness temperature modeled assuming clear skies at the nominal wavelength of 8.5 microns

NAME: temp_11_0um_nom_clear_sky
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere brightness temperature modeled assuming clear skies at the nominal wavelength of 11.0 microns

NAME: temp_12_0um_nom_clear_sky
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere brightness temperature modeled assuming clear skies at the nominal wavelength of 12.0 microns

NAME: refl_0_65um_nom_mean_3x3
LONG_NAME: mean of the 0.65 micron nominal reflectance computed over a 3x3 pixel array

NAME: pixel_sst_unmasked
LONG_NAME: sea surface skin temperature at the pixel with land mask applied and cloud mask not applied

NAME: wind_speed_10m_nwp
LONG_NAME: wind speed from the NWP ancillary data at 10m above ground level

NAME: wind_direction_10m_nwp
LONG_NAME: wind direction from the NWP ancillary data at 10m above ground level

NAME: refl_0_65um_nom_dark
LONG_NAME: top of atmosphere reflectance at the nominal wavelength of 0.65 microns generated from a dark-sky compositing method

NAME: cloud_water_path
LONG_NAME: integrated total cloud water over whole column

NAME: rain_rate
LONG_NAME: derived rain rate

NAME: wind_speed_cloud_top_nwp
LONG_NAME: wind speed from the NWP ancillary data at cloud-top level

NAME: wind_direction_cloud_top_nwp
LONG_NAME: wind direction from the NWP ancillary data at cloud-top level
